SELECT DAMGEUN.CHAT_ROOM_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO DAMGEUN.CHAT_ROOM ( ROOMNO, CHATTYPE, CREATED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{roomNo}, #{chatType}, SYSDATE )
INSERT INTO DAMGEUN.CHAT_PARTICIPANT ( ROOMNO, USERID, LAST_VISIT_TIME ) VALUES ( #{roomNo}, #{userId}, SYSDATE )

SELECT DAMGEUN.MESSAGE_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO DAMGEUN.MESSAGE ( NO, ROOMNO, MESSAGE, IMAGEURL, USERID, SENDTIME ) VALUES ( #{msgNo}, #{roomNo}, #{message}, #{imageUrl}, #{userId}, #{sendTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT cr.ROOMNO, cr.CHATTYPE, cr.CREATED_DATE FROM DAMGEUN.CHAT_ROOM cr JOIN DAMGEUN.CHAT_PARTICIPANT cp1 ON cr.ROOMNO = cp1.ROOMNO JOIN DAMGEUN.CHAT_PARTICIPANT cp2 ON cr.ROOMNO = cp2.ROOMNO WHERE cp1.USERID = #{userId1} AND cp2.USERID = #{userId2} AND cp1.USERID <> cp2.USERID AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DAMGEUN.CHAT_PARTICIPANT WHERE ROOMNO = cr.ROOMNO) = 2

SELECT cr.ROOMNO, cr.CHATTYPE, cr.CREATED_DATE, cp.LAST_VISIT_TIME, (SELECT cp2.USERID FROM DAMGEUN.CHAT_PARTICIPANT cp2 WHERE cp2.ROOMNO = cr.ROOMNO AND cp2.USERID != #{userId}) AS OTHER_USER_ID, (SELECT ui.USERNAME FROM DAMGEUN.USER_INFO ui JOIN DAMGEUN.CHAT_PARTICIPANT cp2 ON ui.USERID = cp2.USERID WHERE cp2.ROOMNO = cr.ROOMNO AND cp2.USERID != #{userId}) AS OTHER_USER_NAME FROM DAMGEUN.CHAT_PARTICIPANT cp JOIN DAMGEUN.CHAT_ROOM cr ON cp.ROOMNO = cr.ROOMNO WHERE cp.USERID = #{userId} ORDER BY cp.LAST_VISIT_TIME DESC NULLS LAST
SELECT NO, ROOMNO, MESSAGE, IMAGEURL, USERID, SENDTIME FROM DAMGEUN.MESSAGE WHERE ROOMNO = #{roomNo} ORDER BY SENDTIME ASC, NO ASC
SELECT ROOMNO, CHATTYPE, CREATED_DATE FROM DAMGEUN.CHAT_ROOM WHERE ROOMNO = #{roomNo}
